divs: Sighting DetailsI came out of my back door at 2:30 AM to smoke a cigarette. I looked up and saw two flashing lights. Red and white. They did not move. I observed for about 10 min then ran in to get my camera. At first I thought they were planes. But there was little to no movement. One moved a little more than the other. When I got back out only one was left as far as I could see. I could not get a picture. My screen was black. I continued to watch it. Very little movement. It would move at slight angles very short distances. I ran into my house at 2:30am, and when I came back out it was gone.
Summary: Two small red and white flashing lights that did not move in the sky.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Lower Saucon
This sighting has never been favorited.
